website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for an inexpensive unit, this is a nice option. It’s small, so it may not be able to take care of a fire that’s been burning for a while. But it won’t consume a lot of storage space, either.
pros: Save even more by purchasing a multi-pack
This model has more metal parts than some competitors, which enhances reliability in the eyes of some owners
cons: This small extinguisher may not be able to knock down bigger fires
The charge dial may (or may not) reflect the actual pressure in the tank

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but a warning about the included wall mount
customer_reviews.text: Just so you know, the plastic wall mount for this fits VERY snugly on the extinguisher. So much so, that if you attach this to drywall and try to use the extinguisher, it will pull the mount off right along with it.. So, attach to a stud if you don't want that happening. That said, I am not certain a child or a weak person could remove this from a wall if it was attached securely to a stud however, it is THAT tight. So keep that in mind. I'm thinking of buying a fork style mount separately.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Replace your Kidde Extinguishers with these.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when learned Kidde Extinguishers with plastic handles are defective. First Alert quality is superb. 4 Pack was a bargain and I’ve replaced the Kidde’s with these. First Alert nozzles are metal and work flawlessly. Trained wife and kids on locations and use. We feel so much more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Bob A

customer_reviews.title: Well made with no plastic parts
customer_reviews.text: Nice size all purpose fire extinguisher. I have been a volunteer firefighter for over 40 years and this is a well built extinguisher with medal parts not plastic
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: I hope they work.  I hope I never find out.
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors house burned down. It was a small little fire at the electrical socket he thought he successfully put out. He ended up leaving the house and it went up in flames while he was gone. The next day I ordered these and put one in four corners of the house. I hope I never have to use them, but I'd rather not wait for my own house fire to wake up to the reality that it can happen to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Baxton

customer_reviews.title: A Smart Investment in Home Safety!
customer_reviews.text: These are great fire extinguishers -- solidly made and a first-rate brand. I bought the four-pack in order to put fire extinguishers around my house -- in the kitchen, master bedroom, laundry room and garage. Price was reasonable enough that I threw out my out-of-date fire extinguishers rather than have them recharged. This is a small investment in home safety.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Meier Wright

customer_reviews.title: This product is a great value. It was inspected by our local fire ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great value. It was inspected by our local fire safety company and processed as being a safe and adequate product to be used in our small medical facility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Have not used these, thank goodness, but happy to have the peace of mind that there is an extinguisher in every room. I liked that this was a convenient 4 pack and the price was good. I had a small kitchen grease fire about 4 years ago and can not say how happy I was to have an extinguisher. I have one in the master bedroom, kitchen, basement, office, 3rd floor family room and garage/car. If there is a fire anywhere, 8 am prepared.
customer_reviews.author: LoriL1970

customer_reviews.title: They looked like they were plastic in the photos
customer_reviews.text: Metal handles were key to these FEs. They looked like they were plastic in the photos, but they are in fact metal.
customer_reviews.author: DMeyer

customer_reviews.title: Seems well built and solid.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a well built fire extinguisher though I haven't had the opportunity to put it to the test. My beef is the horrible plastic strap that comes with the mounting bracket. It is very difficult to snap securely around the extinguisher. You're probably better off using the bracket without it or better yet, buy a new one with a metal strap. I keep one of these in my work truck and have it wall mounted using an aftermarket bracket with a metal strap. There's just no way I'd trust this one.
customer_reviews.author: Skwow

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I got the 4-pack, best value. The discharge nozzle is nicely made of aluminum, my 10 year old extinguishers were plastic. One word of caution, the thin plastic ties that retain the safety pin are extremely hard to break when you pull the pin. I replaced mine with a thin rubber band that would break easily in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: 16copper

customer_reviews.title: Test Squirt, now Dud?
customer_reviews.text: I did a 2 second test squirt, and at most, 14 days later, noticed it would not test squirt again and needed recharge. It's still heavy, just won't work and says needs recharge. I have not owned a fire extinguisher before so do they normally die out somehow after a test squirt?
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: substantial feeling, and red
customer_reviews.text: no other insights fortunately. the instructions seem simple, but they're a little heavier than I wish good fire extinguishers were; the manufacturer claims they can be operated with one hand. there's a discrepancy in the instructions in that the box says pull the pin (metal ring), and the printed enclosure says pull the safety seal. I think it's necessary to do both. It also says to be six feet from source of fire and to not let the fire be between you and the exit. Not sure how that's always possible? Seems to call for more explanation.
customer_reviews.author: VOTE HIM OUT

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging/cheap hangers
customer_reviews.text: I opened each of the four boxes and three of the four had broken mounting brackets. They were just put in loose with the heavy fire extinguishers. As a former claims manager for a trucking company, I would disallow a claim with just poor packing. Plus the hangers are a very hard plastic and although the one mounted okay, I doubt taking the extinguisher off and on would not result in a broken bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dern

customer_reviews.title: be prepared right ?
customer_reviews.text: so tough to give a review till you use them right ??? so bought it to thusly "be prepared" - now have on on every floor of the house - plus on for the garage - easily mounts to the wall and snaps in. remember having them also means you need to "practice / drill" using them - if family doesnt know - remember where they are at - they wont be able to use them when needed. in general appear to be good quality and at decent price - fingers crossed i wont need them - but hopefully they will do the job should that day arise....
customer_reviews.author: rube

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to receive these to find no mounting screws for the wall bracket. Additionally, I was bothered to find the same fire extinguishers at Costco for $20 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Right sized for under the sinks in various rooms. ...
customer_reviews.text: Right sized for under the sinks in various rooms. They did have a product recall, so had to send them back and they were replaced by manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three of Eleven had NO screws!
customer_reviews.text: Every package had been opened before we got them and all screws were missing from three of the eleven casement openers we ordered. Tomorrow, I have to go find the right screws, so I have not yet even discovered whether or not these will fit or even work at all. Just life in modern America.
customer_reviews.author: Max D Minor

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fire extinguisher... no big surprise.
customer_reviews.text: I recently replaced all my fire extinguishers. I opted to put multiple smaller ones vs one big one. Only real review I can say other then the obvious- I tested one and you basically get one really good burst out of it. Enough to cover a typical stove fire. I probably wouldn’t use it for a big commercial property. Nice that it comes with a wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Used one, works great; first alert is a top name
customer_reviews.text: Update: my neighbors started a dumpster fire on the 4th of July so I got to use one of these. Works great, the retention broke and ring came out easy. Useful range was only a few feet, no more than 6 feet, but it had plenty of juice and good pressure the whole way through. The largest fire I would approach with just one of these is maybe the size of a stovetop and the backsplash and surfaces to the sides. It depends a lot on what's burning, but definitely make sure you can reach more than one of these from anywhere you want to use one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: These are not  5 lbs, only 2.5 lbs
customer_reviews.text: The questions answered on the order page said they were 5 lbs, but they are 2.5 lbs and can be bought much cheaper at Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the safety it brings!
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a much larger home and realized I didn't have fire extinguishers readily available. I didn't want to spend tons of money, so I found this. The extinguishers themselves are not huge, but they are perfect if you want to have multiple in each floor or specific rooms in the house. I am actually happy they arent huge because these things get heavy. In the event of an emergency, this would be a comfortable weight to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Good value for 4 pack
customer_reviews.text: Got em to protect my new house have two mounted near doors and work areas in the garage one in the kitchen and one in bedroom great value hope I never have to use them
customer_reviews.author: Darren W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price. Granted, I haven't had to use these and hope not too but these aren't poor quality fire extinguishers, come with mounting hardware, and fit in areas for kitchen, garage, bbq area, and truck.
customer_reviews.author: John R Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Important To Have On Hand
customer_reviews.text: Im married to a firefighter, so having these around the house is an absolute must. They fit great under our kitchen sink. We throw one in the back of the car when we go on longer road trips. Thankfully we can’t speak to the ease or efficacy of use, but knowing how to use it is definitely easy. Everyone should have at least one of these in their home!
customer_reviews.author: asader83

customer_reviews.title: Been in a fire before in a house that we ...
customer_reviews.text: Been in a fire before in a house that we were renting. Now that we have our own condo, I bought these because of the safety of my 15 year old daughter and 3 year old son. We installed one in every room and the living room. We have a bigger one in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Zmae

customer_reviews.title: Smart purchase
customer_reviews.text: Realized I don't have fire extinguishers in my house plus I bet my friends don't either - soooo - ordered them and I have mine now and at Christmas, my friends will get one also. May not be the kind of gift they want - but I'd like them to have a little bit of safety
customer_reviews.author: I. Hass

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to thoroughly rate a product hopefully never used, and hope never will, but it arrived on time, looks rugged, and everything is as promised. I had trouble fastening the plastic strap... the two ends were very hard to snap together... but I'm not all that handy, and I guess you want it extra tight. It is. Good price, good delivery, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: good extinguisher
customer_reviews.text: seems fine, easy mount. don't know if it works, don't want to know...
customer_reviews.author: charles browning

customer_reviews.title: They work but hard to snap on strap.
customer_reviews.text: Like size and they all registered full. Hard to install strap. Had to heat in hot water and mold in place first.
customer_reviews.author: MiataZoom

customer_reviews.title: You Can't Put a Price On Safety
customer_reviews.text: These extinguishers are a must have. They are small fire extinguishers and are perfect for the hall closet, or under a cabinet. They are rechargeable, so if you end up needing to use it, you can get it recharged and re-certified by a professional. The mounts are great to mount somewhere in your home or car.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to use one of fire extinguisher to put out a fire on car, it worked great
customer_reviews.author: THS

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I have not had to use these extinguishers yet, that’s a good thing though! They are small enough to put most anywhere. I have one mounted to the roof of both our Polaris rangers and on our other equipment. Great piece of mind knowing they are there If and when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Tool enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!
customer_reviews.text: Product did not have a weight specified. I looked at the question and answer and somebody said its 4.8 pounds, based on this I purchased the product. Seller should pay for the return shipping because of insufficient/inaccurate information on product description. Seller still insisting I pay for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: M. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These fire extinguishers are awesome. I purchased the 4 pack. Compact design with nice, tight mounting. I went ahead and put these onto a stud... just a little concern with how snug they fit into the mount. Although if they were needed, pulled screws out of drywall would be the least of your concern. I saw some reviews about these being low on charge, none of mine were.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We have not used these but we did hang them. We had a fire in our garage a couple of weeks ago that we put out using a fire extinguisher. It happened in the middle of the night. I then realized that one fire extinguisher is not enough. It's better to have a couple all around your house.
customer_reviews.author: Punky

customer_reviews.title: One of those must have items.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our home. I have them spread around the house, garage, and outside by our grill. I like their construction; each came with a mounting bracket and clear instructions on use. Good price
customer_reviews.author: bluesy

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to use fire extinguishers.
customer_reviews.text: This smoke detectors come with hardware to hang on the wall, but small enough to put anywhere. Comes with a pull pin, so no accidents. Usuable on any type of fire. We put one in each bedroom, and one in kitchen. The easy directions for use are large print, right on the extinguisher. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: leigh kov

customer_reviews.title: Buy these Fire Extinguisher!  Remember why , it's LOVE !!!
customer_reviews.text: They got here quickly . I still need to mount them in appropriate locations in my home. Please read the instructions if not for you do it for everybody else you love and teach your children how to use it , and how to get out if they can . And when it's wrong to try to get through the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Allen W. Bauck

customer_reviews.title: Very nice with one caveat.
customer_reviews.text: Well made extinguishers, but proper installation is a nightmare. The included strap to hold the body of the extinguisher in place is next to impossible to fasten. I left mine off, so they're just hanging via the neck mount. The neck mount is secure enough, but the strap would have been nice for extra reinforcement.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't needed to use them, these are well built rechargeable fire extinguishers. Every home should have them. Get yours today.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ed

customer_reviews.title: They're only good for ~5
customer_reviews.text: every home ought to have several extinguishers and keep them current. They're only good for ~5 years
customer_reviews.author: James A. deFau

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We bought this package of for our house and condo. We only needed 3 but at the cost of a little more than 2, we got 4. We now have an extinguisher within a quick response if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: We like these.
customer_reviews.text: Although we have yet to need one I like to make sure we are not trapped at one end of you house or RV without an accessible fire extinguisher. These were easy to hang up and have a gauge to show they are up to pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pat

customer_reviews.title: CAN"T HAVE ENOUGH EXTINGUISHERS
customer_reviews.text: YOU CANNOT HAVE ENOUGH EXTINGUISHERS . YOU CANNOT HAVE ENOUGH EXTINGUISHERS . YOU CANNOT HAVE ENOUGH EXTINGUISHERS . That is all I have to say.
customer_reviews.author: kurt

customer_reviews.title: Hope I don’t need this- it’s a good price anyway
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used these, and I hope I don’t ever need to. But they arrived on time, they look good quality and they are a great price. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My chicken coup caught on fire from the heat lamp and an extinguisher saved the day. Ordered this 4 pack for piece of mind. Great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: TheFakeFarmer

customer_reviews.title: Filled my extinguisher needs.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered four, received four in good condition and in a timely manner. Easily installed however, you need to provide your own wall anchors as none are supplied. Any home owner should have a healthy supply of anchors on hand to hang pictures and such as I did. When necessary, will order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Hank J. Sedlak

customer_reviews.title: Good fire extinguisher and great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had reason to use them, but they are substantial and nice and gives pleasure knowing we have the protection.
customer_reviews.author: R, Peck

customer_reviews.title: First Alert HOME1 Rechargeable Home Fire Extinguisher 4-Pack
customer_reviews.text: All fire extinguishers arrived intact. Can't rate performance until used. I hope I never have to rate their performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jay55

customer_reviews.title: Great for home and automobile
customer_reviews.text: Bought a four pack of these fire extinguishers for both my home and for my truck because my previous ones were past their expiration date. Easy to install and hang up. Highly recommend having extinguishers in every part of your home to protect yourself and your family.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Romero

customer_reviews.title: Great to have in case of emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and love that it comes in a 4 pack. I hope to never have to use them but so happy to have in case of an emergency
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: A necessary product, at a bargan-price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that EVERYONE needs to have at-least-two-of, in each home, and even in the vehicle. I bought two sets, because the price was great, and I am able to give a few as gifts, to those whom need this essential home-first-aid.
customer_reviews.author: LindseyNarrates

customer_reviews.title: Four Pack is Nice
customer_reviews.text: We have 40 year-old extinguishers that we never shook end to end on an annual basis as recommended, so decided to start over with these. I like the multi-pack.
customer_reviews.author: lotsamice

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every household
customer_reviews.text: Had a kid make a dumb mistake with a light bulb. Bought 3 of these instantly. Now I feel safer. One on each floor.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Breeding

customer_reviews.title: Fire doesn't have a chance
customer_reviews.text: Fits the needs of our trucks in the field. Gives us the needed safety to our trucks by also storing easily in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: So easy to replace my old ones
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to order a set like this, I needed four to replace my old ones and these are perfect. Also see that they are rechargable.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described..
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as described, came on time, and were a great deal for this many quality fire extinguishers !
customer_reviews.author: jtm692

customer_reviews.title: effective, good value
customer_reviews.text: Came as promised, as seen everywhere, convenient and since we need a dozen great way to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gsmith

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Needed some fire extinguishers for my home and a rental property. These did the job nicely at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Natale

customer_reviews.title: leak down
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 4 pack in April 2020 .All for had leaked down to zero by Sept 2020 . Thankfully I periodically check these things because If I waited till I needed them I would have been up a creek . Just another example of cheap Chinese junk sold by Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are 4 of them
customer_reviews.text: If I ever have a fire, I now have four fire extinguishers. One of them is bound to work!
customer_reviews.author: DBK

customer_reviews.title: Good extinguishers distributed with in miles of where I live
customer_reviews.text: Good extinguishers distributed with in miles of where I live. Expensive delivery cost because it is shipped as hazardous material. Like $30 per box. the extinguisher themselves were 4 pack standard First alert product with a charge indicator.so i was pleased it had all you needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Great for home fire protection
customer_reviews.text: I mounted these near the exits. Never had a home fire but one never knows about these old homes and the electrical problems that may arise. Safety First!
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: Items came as advertised; easy to setup and install. Hopefully will never have to use them
customer_reviews.author: Dick A Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great, I feel protected now
customer_reviews.text: These took much longer to arrive than they said they would. But now I feel protected and I appreciated the mounts that each one came with. I haven’t tested any of them yet
customer_reviews.author: Donna smith

customer_reviews.title: Needed fire extinguishers for homes and boats. Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Had a small fire that my husband had to put out with his hands resulting in 2nd degree burns and a lot of pain. We then realized that we did not even have a fire extinguisher at that home. Bought 4 so this will not happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of quality built. Hopefully I don't ever have to use it. Good price. Each unit comes with mount and strap, screws not provided.
customer_reviews.author: Dung Tran

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than sorry
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used yet but look sturdy and sleek! Will make sure to update if usage is necessary....
customer_reviews.author: Ben A.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the Home
customer_reviews.text: Fire Extinguisher is a must have, they are Rechargeable. Not sure how or where to recharge, but haven't used them yet anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect quantity.
customer_reviews.text: I put it one in the garage, one back yard, one kitchen and one living room.
customer_reviews.author: MappleBobert

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Hard to give a rating for it,until I need it, but it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Mordred

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this purchase (during national fire safety month).
customer_reviews.author: S.O.

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, just as described, I recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Dobrow

customer_reviews.title: Every household should have one
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the four pack of fire extinguishers to share with family households. Hope we never need to use them but more comfortable knowing we have them.
customer_reviews.author: bes1

customer_reviews.title: Great for your home
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for my home. Stuck these all over my house. I hope to never use them, but I'm happy to know they're there in case I need them.
customer_reviews.author: pianoman16

customer_reviews.title: Good price and trusted brans
customer_reviews.text: Good product and a must have for any potential fire source in the home.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal for a Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall durability and all metal construction of the extinguisher! Buying a 4-pack via Amazon was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Blase

customer_reviews.title: Well built and priced right
customer_reviews.text: Prefere these to the Kidde which have too much plastic
customer_reviews.author: Bill Groom

customer_reviews.title: Fire extinguisher good for al common fires
customer_reviews.text: Has a convient hook to hang them. High quality steel.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dcloux

customer_reviews.title: Good size for the house.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good for placing these around the house. Kitchen, basement, and at the top of the stairs.

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: Small, compact - I keep these in guest rooms, closets.

customer_reviews.text: Great product for price- important to have multiple thru the house

customer_reviews.title: Keep one in most rooms
customer_reviews.text: I like having them around the house and on the patio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great value for 4 high end extinguishers. It's a brand you can trust, which is pretty important for something like this :)

customer_reviews.title: Good safety for home
customer_reviews.text: We are so glad that we got fire extinguishers for the house very good to have

customer_reviews.title: More products for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them which is a good thing. I hope not to do hard to rate but looks and the four pack was nice

customer_reviews.title: Home fire safety
customer_reviews.text: These are excellant extinguishers and easy to use and install.

customer_reviews.title: put these all around my house
customer_reviews.text: have one under each sink and by any gas appliance

customer_reviews.title: Safety 1st !
customer_reviews.text: Part of a Safety kit I made for adult kids to have around. Arrived on time and packed well.

customer_reviews.title: as described.  comes with wall mounts
customer_reviews.text: used it for a new house. a good way to quickly improve the safety of the home.

customer_reviews.title: First alert has quality products
customer_reviews.text: The idiots at maxwarehouse are the problem. They send damaged products and won't make good on it. Stay away!!!

customer_reviews.title: Compact.
customer_reviews.text: Put them all over the house. Compact so they fit under cabinets well.

customer_reviews.title: Nice 4 pack, make the home safer!
customer_reviews.text: Got them on time, and all charged and ready if needed.

customer_reviews.title: Fire extinguishers
customer_reviews.text: The fire extinguishers were a great price for 3lb with hangers

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: Everybody needs these. Much cheaper to buy in bulk here rather than one at a time in box stores.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Placed them throughout the house/garage and one in the trailer. Great value for keeping your family safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Swank

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed...had a small oven fire and realized we didn't have a fire extinguisher in our new home. The 4 pack was perfect. One for each floor, plus garage
customer_reviews.author: kevinhwvu

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described and on time. 4 high quality extinguishers for the price I paid was great and no standing in line!

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good extinguisher.. haven't had to use it thank goodness And I'm not going to test it out just to be sure
customer_reviews.author: Kim Colby

customer_reviews.title: I’m satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not had to use them yet, The External product met the description, packaging was good.
customer_reviews.author: Michele P

product_meta.title: First Alert HOME1 Rechargeable Home Fire Extinguisher 4-Pack, Red | UL Rated 1-A:10-B:C | All-Metal Fire Extinguisher with Pull Pin & Safety Seal | U.S. Coast Guard Approved for Marine Use
product_meta.description: Style:Standard Home Fire ExtinguisherHave the First Alert Rechargeable Home Fire Extinguisher 4-Pack (HOME1) on hand to minimize damage or injury in the event of a fire. Ideal for any household location and featuring an all-metal body, trigger, and valve, it fights wood, paper, trash, plastics, gasoline, oil, and electrical-equipment fires—plus is UL rated 1-A:10-B:C. If you’re required to discharge the monoammonium phosphate extinguishing agent, visit a professional for recharge. Until then, use the corrosion-resistant, color-coded gauge to accurately measure the contents. The pull pin with a safety seal prevents tampering, while the waterproof label with 4-step instructions is always clear to read. It’s U.S. Coast Guard approved for marine use and comes with a mounting bracket and strap for secure storage.
feature_bullets: MULTIPURPOSE USE| Fights wood, paper, trash, plastics, gasoline, oil, and electrical-equipment fires
ALL-METAL CONSTRUCTION | UL rated 1-A:10-B:C; durable all-metal construction with a commercial-grade metal valve and trigger
EXTINGUISHING AGENT | Uses monoammonium phosphate extinguishing agent; rechargeable by certified professionals after use
PULL PIN WITH SAFETY SEAL | Helps prevent accidental discharge and tampering; waterproof label with 4-step instructions
METAL GAUGE | Corrosion-resistant, easy-to-read, and color-coded metal gauge provides accurate measurement
COAST GUARD APPROVED & WARRANTY | U.S. Coast Guard approved for marine use; 10-year limited warranty
MOUNTING BRACKET & STRAP | Included for secure placement
